page.title: 02ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITIES
page.content: With the closure of the two coalmines, many jobs in the area were lost. Many men transferred to nearby coal mines. In the area there are few opportunities in industry primary,secondary or tertiary. The nearby town of Nuneaton,or the cities of Coventry and Birmingham provide many in the area with jobs. Farming is the most important economic activity in the area,providing full and part-time jobs. The main type of farming is mixed farming,but with a leaning towards livestock,with many of the crops used for fodder. The following three pages have typical examples of the types of farm in the area.
